alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 9:23PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow continuing across northeastern Nevada... Occasional snow continues across northeastern Nevada tonight. Snow is expected to decrease somewhat through tonight. However, temperatures are falling well below freezing east of Battle Mountain on I-80 and all roadways in Elko county. An additional 1 to 3 inches of snow before sunrise Monday morning is expected. This will cause slick roads in areas that have not been treated or plowed. Visibility at times in heavier snow showers could be one half mile or less. Reduce speed especially over passes and summits, increase distance between vehicles, and use low beams to arrive at your destination safely. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
